verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Behold, What Love, What Boundless Love, The Father Hath Bestowed On Sinners Lost, That We Should Be Now Called “The Sons Of God!”

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Behold, What Manner Of Love! What Manner Of Love The Father Hath Bestowed Upon Us, That We, That We Should Be Called, Should Be Called The Sons Of God!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: No Longer Far From Him But Now By “Precious Blood” Made Nigh, Accepted In The “Well Beloved,” Near To God’s Heart We Lie.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: What We In Glory Soon Shall Be, It Doth Not Yet Appear; But When Our Precious Lord We See, We Shall His Image Bear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: With Such A Blessed Hope In View, We Would More Holy Be, More Like Our Risen, Glorious Lord, Whose Face We Soon Shall See.
